replies.body:
Support mains in 2k18:

{{champion:555}}: "Did I "support" right?"
But Pyke's whole thing is that he splits gold with the ADC allowing him to make gold at 0 cost to his ADC.

> [{quoted}](name=SomeSoNSo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TnwcnEHZ,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2018-07-03T21:21:51.324+0000)
>
> But Pyke's whole thing is that he splits gold with the ADC allowing him to make gold at 0 cost to his ADC.

The joke is that he's still taking the kill.
I guess? It has literally none of the negative repercussions of traditional kill stealing.

{{champion:240}} You Suuuure did buddy

(If you don't get the joke check my op.gg)

Suppoer mains in 2k18:
{{champion:37}}: "Did I "support" right?"

{{champion:51}}: Why did you KS?

That looks familiar. TOO familiar. Oh wait, there it is in my private folders
Just be thankful that Lux gets a free sightstone with her support item so we don't have 3 more years of Lux supports that won't buy vision.

> [{quoted}](name=PapaGreg21,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TnwcnEHZ,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-07-03T16:48:52.355+0000)
>
> Just be thankful that Lux gets a free sightstone with her support item so we don't have 3 more years of Lux supports that won't buy vision.

{{item:1056}}
You mean support mains since the dawn of times?

Top 3 ADC comments so far this season:

- Lantern? WTF you mean grab the lantern? (I WAS using Dark Star skin so....slightly understandable...but still)
- Yo, Morg, what's with the KS? (They were standing in my puddle when they died. Like I can control the dmg ticks.) << Repeat for anyone with any sort of poison, or my favorite, a tank with Sunfire Cape.
- WTF Teemo support? They have a Nautilus. We're going to get owned. (Jhin and I proceed to eradicate the Varus and Nautilus in lane. Jhin gets all the honors. No more mention of how bad Teemo support is. Amazing right?)

Bonus - Wtf man why you feeding so hard? (Maybe if I didn't have to protect your ass that can't stay out of combat and continually insists on following me while I poke instead of getting CS .................................................) I have no problem making the sacrifice play for a teammate - once, maybe twice depending on the circumstances AFTER the first one. If I sacrifice and you die 3 secs later, either I made a mistake and you came to cover me so I took the fall to get you out, or you're an idiot and ran BACK into combat (in which case I made a mistake I won't be repeating), or you got away. If you got away, I'll do it again if needed to keep you up. The support can be down kills/deaths - it's the assists that matter. Kills are good too, you know, more gold and all, but it's better for the team to split it.

PS - Objectives, not KDA, are the point of League. Get it through your heads. A support dying 10+ times is nothing new (less is preferable yes, but we ARE talking Bronze here), because that's their JOB IN THE GAME. To save the squishy ADC and whoever else to fight another day, or at the very least, to contribute some sort of CC to fights. Of course on the flip side, the best CC is death, so......

{{sticker:sona-playing}}

ADC and Deserved kill they worked hard for never go in the same sentence. Its usually ADC gets the last hit as the support has to spoon feed kills to them while making sure they dont die under tower even though the enemies arent even near tower.

So I like playing enchanter supports and mages as supports with the occasional tank and caretaker. 
If I get a kill either a.) you didnt go in for it and you were walking away so I am trying to make sure we get it.
b.) I used an ability that has scorch or comet that killed them 
c.) you died and I killed them under tower

If  your support gets a few kills shut the hell up. YOU BOTH ARE GETTING FED THEN. You get the damn cs without a problem (and possibly some assist gold) and they get some kill gold.
cropped ahegao is the best meme. change my mind.
I honestly surprise myself with how much I end up ksing when I play support. The funniest part is, I tend to get more kills as Janna and Sona than I ever do with supports like Zyra and Morgana.
I played a game years back as support nunu. I swear the rng gods favored me that game because I ended with like 8-10 kills using my pitiful autoattacks.
{{champion:99}} "Would it help if I apologized?"
{{champion:267}} : W For A Free Kill
{{champion:201}}  braum is here for you.
Sauce ?

Heh... had a Jhin recently while I was Zyra that whined and complained he couldn’t get the last hit in when I was 100-0ing the enemy Sona... then had a few kills taken by both scorch and melee plant hits that I can’t stop. We won the lane stop whining. He still ended the game with a good amount of kills.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IT_sYE9Ol6k
What's this icon {{champion:412}}
I know that face and the image it is part of. Eliskalti knows.

And then my adc bans my pick because "Lux isn't support", and "you're gonna take doran's ring". So yeah, can't really feel bad for ADC who cry about ks...Contrary to the popular belief, Lux actually can be played as support. 
As OniZetsu said, I only use my Lux ult when the enemy is out of your range, already behind their turret, when you die, or when it's a team fight and it's more important to kill than who kills.
I don't get follow. What ADC has ever worked hard and deserved kills?

I mean... if traditional Supports don’t feel effective since hypercarries are irellivant, and tank supports die in the blink of an eye why not play say.... {{champion:432}} {{item:3092}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3100}} {{sticker:sona-playing}}
https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/811496/3.0
